trophies.name: Wasted Time
trophies.description: You weren't in too much of a hurry to stop and dance, or smell the flowers, or practice your moonwalk...

trophies.name: A Nervous Walk
trophies.description: You kept looking back over your shoulder - worried about the lava?

trophies.name: Watching Paint Dry
trophies.description: Why did you stare at the wall? Why? WHY?!

trophies.name: Wishful Thinking
trophies.description: Even though we told you about the lava you thought about trying to walk out through the entrance, didn't you?

trophies.name: Wishful Dying
trophies.description: You actually died by walking back through the entrance! We told you there was LAVA!

trophies.name: Winner, Winner, Cheddar Dinner
trophies.description: You escaped the maze!

trophies.name: Flawless Victory
trophies.description: You defeated the maze in the shortest possible number of moves. NICE!

trophies.name: You Fought the Wall
trophies.description: You fought the wall and the wall won.

trophies.name: Spinning Your Wheels
trophies.description: You tried to walk without bothering to stand up first.

trophies.name: The Scribbler
trophies.description: You took the time to scratch a note into the floor.

trophies.name: Paperback Writer
trophies.description: You wrote more than one note in a room... Are you trying to be a novelist?

trophies.name: Jumping Jack Flash
trophies.description: Rather than solve the maze, you jumped. In place. For no reason at all.

trophies.name: Kicking Up Dust
trophies.description: You tried to jump without bothering to stand up first and ended up just mule-kicking the dusty air.

trophies.name: Mighty Mouse
trophies.description: You saw a trap ahead and JUMPED, flying over danger like the Mighty Mouse of legend.

trophies.name: Shortcutter
trophies.description: You found a path through the maze that let you leave more than half of it unexplored!

trophies.name: The Long Way Home
trophies.description: Your path through the maze included more than 75% of the rooms.

trophies.name: The Longer Way Home
trophies.description: Your path through the maze included more than 90% of the rooms.

trophies.name: The Longest Way Home
trophies.description: You actually visited every single cell in the maze. Were preparing for retirement by practicing your Sunday driving?

trophies.name: A Light at the End
trophies.description: You saw the light... of the exit! And chose not to follow it.

trophies.name: Dazed and Confused
trophies.description: You did something unwise and spent a turn stunned as a reward.

trophies.name: Double Backer
trophies.description: You visited the same rooms over, and over, and over again...

trophies.name: Looper
trophies.description: You found a path that you really liked and kept repeating it.

trophies.name: You FELL for It
trophies.description: You found a pit trap... The hard way.

trophies.name: Too Hot to Handle
trophies.description: You found, and detonated, a fire trap. Didn't anybody every tell you not to play with fire?

trophies.name: Out of Moves
trophies.description: We gave you enough moves to visit every room of the maze... THREE TIMES! You still somehow managed to use them all without finding the exit.
